      • getLocationName

        protected java.lang.String getLocationName(java.lang.String name)
        Some Navitia providers return location names with wrong case. This method can be used to fix the name when locations are parsed.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the location
        Returns:
        the fixed name of the location

      • queryNearbyLocations

        public NearbyLocationsResult queryNearbyLocations(java.util.EnumSet<LocationType> types,
                                                  Location location,
                                                  int maxDistance,
                                                  int maxLocations)
                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: NetworkProvider
        Find locations near to given location. At least one of lat/lon pair or station id must be present in that location.
        Parameters:
        types - types of locations to find
        location - location to determine nearby stations
        maxDistance - maximum distance in meters, or 0
        maxLocations - maximum number of locations, or 0
        Returns:
        nearby stations
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • queryDepartures

        public QueryDeparturesResult queryDepartures(java.lang.String stationId,
                                             @Nullable
                                             java.util.Date time,
                                             int maxDepartures,
                                             boolean equivs)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: NetworkProvider
        Get departures at a given station, probably live
        Parameters:
        stationId - id of the station
        time - desired time for departing, or null for the provider default
        maxDepartures - maximum number of departures to get or 0
        equivs - also query equivalent stations?
        Returns:
        result object containing the departures
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • queryTrips

        public QueryTripsResult queryTrips(Location from,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Location via,
                                   Location to,
                                   java.util.Date date,
                                   boolean dep,
                                   @Nullable
                                   java.util.Set<Product> products,
                                   @Nullable
                                   NetworkProvider.Optimize optimize,
                                   @Nullable
                                   NetworkProvider.WalkSpeed walkSpeed,
                                   @Nullable
                                   NetworkProvider.Accessibility accessibility,
                                   @Nullable
                                   java.util.Set<NetworkProvider.Option> options)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: NetworkProvider
        Query trips, asking for any ambiguousnesses
        Parameters:
        from - location to route from, mandatory
        via - location to route via, may be null
        to - location to route to, mandatory
        date - desired date for departing, mandatory
        dep - date is departure date? true for departure, false for arrival
        products - products to take into account, or null for the provider default
        optimize - optimize trip for one aspect, e.g. duration
        walkSpeed - walking ability, or null for the provider default
        accessibility - route accessibility, or null for the provider default
        options - additional options, or null for the provider default
        Returns:
        result object that can contain alternatives to clear up ambiguousnesses, or contains possible trips
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public QueryTripsResult queryMoreTrips(QueryTripsContext contextObj,
                                       boolean later)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: NetworkProvider
        Query more trips (e.g. earlier or later)
        Parameters:
        contextObj - context to query more trips from
        Returns:
        result object that contains possible trips
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
